verses.verse: So stand for the freedom that the Anointed King freed us for, and don't be held in again by a crossbeam of slavery.
Look, I, Paul, tell you that if you should be circumcised, the Anointed King will in no way benefit you.
Again, I am a witness to every person being circumcised that he is a person with a debt to do the whole law.
You were rendered exempt away from the Anointed King, any who are made right in the law. You fell from the generosity.
You see, we (with a spirit from trust) patiently wait for the good anticipation of the right way;
for in the Anointed King Jesus, neither circumcision has strength for anything, nor uncircumcision, but what has strength is trust that is active through love.
You were running nicely. Who chopped you up for you to not be persuaded of the truth?
The persuasion is not from the One who invited you.
A little yeast causes the whole batch to rise.
I have been persuaded for you in the Master, that you will focus on nothing else. The one agitating you will haul the judgment, whoever he may be.
I, brothers, if I still speak publicly for circumcision, why am I still pursued? Clearly the obstacle of the cross has been rendered useless.
I would like it if the people upsetting you will also chop themselves off from you.
You see, you were invited based on freedom, brothers, only not the freedom for an opportunity to the physical body, but through the love be slaves to each other;
for the entire law is accomplished in one message, in the "you will love the person near you as yourself" message.
If you bite and eat up each other, look out that you aren't consumed by each other.
I say, "Traipse around in the Spirit, and you will not in any way finish the desire of the physical body."

You see, the physical body desires what is against the Spirit, but the Spirit what is against the physical body. These lie in opposition to each other so that whatever you may want, these you don't do.
If you are led by the Spirit, you are not under the law.
The actions of the physical body are shown, some that are cheating on a spouse, sexual sin, desire that is not clean, indulgent activity,
idol worship, drug abuse, enemy relationships, fightings, passions, bursts of anger, contentions, factions, sects,

envies, murders, bouts of drunkenness, wild parties, and the things like these that I am telling you beforehand, just as I also already said, that the people constantly doing these types of things will not inherit God's empire.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, happiness, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, trust,
humility, restraint. Against these types of things, there is no law.
The people of the Anointed King nailed the physical body to a cross with the hardships and the desires.
If we live with the Spirit, with the Spirit also we should march in step.
We should not become people with delusions of magnificence, hassling each other, envying each other.
